Go Erlangen!

24 Sep 2018 | | coding, erlangen, bayern, germany

A little tool for a small city

Here we are!! I recently moved to Germany to join the adidas - platform engineering team. This is a really small piece of GOde (:P) I wrote for Erlangen (my new place) citizens ^^

Needs

You will only need an https://www.internationalshowtimes.com/ movie api key. You can get one quite easily by going here

Scope

You would simply like to be informed about new OV movies on air in cinemas from your shell‚Ä¶here we go! The script in the repo provide you a draft to start from ^^

Improvements

Webinterface, scheduling, notification‚Ä¶enjoy the city - and the repo!

Thank you everybody for reading!
